attributes.action: Make builders to build new homes with garages that actually fit cars in them
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I know of a few people who have moved into homes less than 5 years old and unable to park their cars (small cars such as a Vauxhall Corsa) as the garages are too narrow.
This causes the estates to be clogged up with cars, which chould have been avoided if planners/architects actually designed garages to accommodate a large number of different cars.
